languages.text: "Скорее всего еще и убийца. Но это-то и волнует сердце! У {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости такой тонкий вкус!"
"A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"
languages.original_text: "Скорее всего еще и убийца. Но это-то и волнует сердце! У {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости такой тонкий вкус!"

traits.locale_text: "A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"
"A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"
"A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"
"A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"

languages.text: “很有可能还是个杀手，但这只会让人更加兴奋不已！那位大人的品位可真是高雅！”
languages.original_text: "A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"

traits.locale_text: “很有可能还是个杀手，但这只会让人更加兴奋不已！那位大人的品位可真是高雅！”

languages.text: 「ほぼ殺人者でもあるがな。だが、それは心をさらに惹きつけるだけだ。陛下は、なかなかの嗜好をお持ちのようだ！」
languages.original_text: "A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"

traits.locale_text: 「ほぼ殺人者でもあるがな。だが、それは心をさらに惹きつけるだけだ。陛下は、なかなかの嗜好をお持ちのようだ！」

languages.text: «Y probablemente una asesina también. ¡Pero eso solo hace que sea aún más emocionante! ¡Su señoría tiene un gusto exquisito!».
languages.original_text: "A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"

traits.locale_text: «Y probablemente una asesina también. ¡Pero eso solo hace que sea aún más emocionante! ¡Su señoría tiene un gusto exquisito!».

languages.text: « Et sans doute une meurtrière également, mais ça ne fait que battre le cœur un peu plus fort ! Sa Seigneurie a un goût exquis ! »
languages.original_text: "A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"

traits.locale_text: « Et sans doute une meurtrière également, mais ça ne fait que battre le cœur un peu plus fort ! Sa Seigneurie a un goût exquis ! »

languages.text: "Wahrscheinlich auch eine Mörderin. Aber das lässt das Herz noch höher schlagen! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} hat einen ausgezeichneten Geschmack!"
languages.original_text: "A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"

traits.locale_text: "Wahrscheinlich auch eine Mörderin. Aber das lässt das Herz noch höher schlagen! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} hat einen ausgezeichneten Geschmack!"

languages.text: "Aynı zamanda katil olma olasılığı da yüksek. Böyleleri kalbi küt küt attırır! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin rafine bir zevki varmış!"
languages.original_text: "A killer too, most likely. But that only thrills the heart even more! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has exquisite taste!"

traits.locale_text: "Büyük ihtimalle bir katildir de aynı zamanda. Ama böyle şeyler kalbin daha hızlı atmasına sebep olur! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin rafine bir zevki varmış!"
